game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifacts from the lost temple.
game.description: A long-abandoned temple holds secrets and treasures that have been hidden for centuries. Brave adventurers are needed to uncover its mysteries.
game.reward: 100 gold coins, 10 experience points, and a magical amulet

tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the lost temple.
tasks.description: Look for any hidden paths or clues that might lead you to the temple's entrance.

tasks.objective: Solve the puzzle to unlock the inner chamber.
tasks.description: Study the ancient runes etched into the walls and use your knowledge of the language to unlock the door.
tasks.location: Inside the lost temple's main hall

tasks.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the treasure room.
tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous traps and puzzles to reach the treasure room and claim your reward.
